attributes.action: Have some RAF fighter jets  fly over Wembley stadium during the very last bit of our national anthem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching a squadron of RAF fighter jets skim the top of Wembley stadium during our national anthem would not only help to justify those ticket prices but also it would inject some national pride into our national stadium while watching our national sport! Come on England!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
